website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon 1 V2 is the camera its predecessor should have been. With a comfortable shooting design and plenty of features, the V2 is an appealing buy.
pros: Control system simple, easy to use
cons: Tendency to overexpose highlights in automatic modes
Best results with F-mount lenses rather than Nikon 1 lenses

customer_reviews.title: A Niche not Filled
customer_reviews.text: Nikon and Canon seem like they want to make a camera for every budget, skill level, and niche in the field. But, this falls short on so many levels. It is functionally irritating for the professional with many features that should be easy to change end up buried through cumbersome menus. It’s also expensive and tedious for the beginner. The image quality is average at best and the flexibility of its functions are limited. Anything other than an already perfectly lit room is going to be a struggle. Avoid this model and find another that is more useful.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Great used product overall.
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera considering its age and it being used. Better image quality than previous edition(V1). Nice grip for the hand unlike the previous version or the third version (this the main reason I made the purchase). Using it with the FT1 mount but no selecting the focus. All you have to do is focus and re-compose. USED CONDITION: GREAT. Thank you for providing images of the product unlike some sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Really nice system.
customer_reviews.text: Small, versatile, easy to use and high quality product. I wish they had continued with this line. Originally overpriced in my opinion, but can find some good deals now.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Really great camera
customer_reviews.text: Small, yet powerful. I'm a amateur photographer and I can tell you that my pics never looked better. The quality of the image processor is very high, comparable to professional SLR cameras. The automatic focus is incredibly fast, meaning you will never miss the moments. Also, it turns on very quickly just unlocking and rotating the lens, another feature that helps you not to miss any moment.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the V1
customer_reviews.text: This one is much smaller and lighter than the V1 and has a built-in flash. It was a no-brainer to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: klaus holzapfel

customer_reviews.title: Great camera,
customer_reviews.text: I have a V1 and found this camera easier to use. Both great cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy E Greaves

customer_reviews.title: Nikon V2 purchase from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. It is light to carry around and it takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: David Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: 5 which is very help full to take sharp and fantastic bird image in budget
customer_reviews.text: very help full camera to use with Dslr nikon lens with the help of ft-1 adpter. its help me to make my nikon 70-200 f2.8 with 1.7 teleconvertet to be 918mm f4.5 which is very help full to take sharp and fantastic bird image in budget . the ft-1 adaptr its the most important peace in this backage . even with 70-300 you will get 810mm f5.6 which is so good and the image is so sharp . note that i dont have any nikon 1 lens so i cant tell in this field any thing. dont miss this if you intrested in bird photogrphy.
customer_reviews.author: abduulla a.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 D300s and 2 D700s and purchased 2 V2s in February. We're back to buy two more, because they are very good lightweight cameras. We're sold on them for sure. They have most of the features found on the bigger cameras but are a better size for travel bags and long hikes than the big ones.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small ligtweight but decent camera for travel. This is it! Hats off to Nikon, now if I was only a little more talented at taking photos.
customer_reviews.author: A nanny mouse

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera! Shoots well in all situations including low light. The viewfinder takes a little getting used to but I have gone from a d80 to the 1 v2 and with it being so small, it is simply hard to beat! I look forward to purchasing the FT-1 mount and trying out some different lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Akin

customer_reviews.title: Good camera with a few not so obvious compromises...
customer_reviews.text: Silent mode turns off physical shutter (should be a separate mode) Grip is so much nice after switching from the J3 Good camera for those concerned about weight on outdoor trips Too many frilly pointless functions in my opinion. someone putting in this much money for this camera is not looking for creative modes, especially when the potentially most important one (time lapse function) is not present. FAIL! I knew all this walking into this camera body, so I guess those are just my tid bits. Other reviews are much more thorough and hit points I would if I wanted to type for twenty minutes.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance in a very small package. Perfect camera for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A great take-along camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is better than my iPhone, much smaller than my Canon DLSR, and easy to carry - unobtrusive. That said, the quality of the pictures does not compare well to my Canon with top of the line lenses. Hard to get much of a bokeh with this camera no matter what lens you put on it. Also does not always focus properly so I usually wind up with some pictures that at not in proper focus. Still a great walk-around camera for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: C. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Rod jr
customer_reviews.text: Was amazed by how easy it was to use. I had no camera experience what so ever and this one was recommended to me and I love it
customer_reviews.author: rodney

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: i love this camara, this is what i am looking for. I just suggest to buy your own lence. the 10-30mm is not really useful.....
customer_reviews.author: Jiefu li

customer_reviews.title: unit over heats when used for a long time
customer_reviews.text: easy to use however when using for a long time camera overheats and wants to shut down other features are okay
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Items
customer_reviews.text: The follow items missing: EN-EL21 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery MH-28 Battery Charger UC-E19 USB Cable BS-N3000 Multi Accessory Port Cover BF-N1000 Body Cap AN-N1000 Strap ViewNX 2 Short Movie Creator CD User's Manual Reference manual CD
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Nikon 1 V2
customer_reviews.text: It was not quite what I expected and I returned it and purchased a Sony, which I like but it is heavy also.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Oyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little camera! I love the portability - it's the only camera I take when traveling. The picture quality paired with the 32mm f1.2 prime blew me away. Lens selection and low light capability is still a step down from my D7200, but overall great value and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos C. Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: To be honest..I bought this for its look. I love it. It's also quite simple to operate it. Wonderful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda Gerard

customer_reviews.title: The Absolute Biggest Pile of Junk in Photography. Junk ...
customer_reviews.text: The Absolute Biggest Pile of Junk in Photography. Junk lenses made in China. I am being 100% Honest. I am literally on my 5th Lens. This last one only lasted me 5 months. LENS ERROR Contact Nikon my screen says. So I contact Nikon. They did nothing for me. Nothing. I will never ever in my whole life ever buy another Nikon product!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Why? NEX-6 is superior
customer_reviews.text: why would any buy this camera? the sony nex-6 is superior in every respect and cost about the same. nikon 1 cx sensors are smaller than micro 4/3; that's just pathetic. sony nex camera have aps-c size sensor that will blow this camera out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: M. Luu

product_meta.title: Nikon 1 V2 14.2 MP HD Digital Camera Body Only (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style:Body OnlyFROM THE MANUFACTURER
 



Turn life's fast-moving adventures into amazing visual stories. Slow down reality and freeze exactly the right moment; preview end-result photos before you even shoot them; blend motion, stills and sound in a new way; take control with PSAM modes right on the dial and much more—and do it all with speed and precision.


FOR CREATIVITY THAT HAS NO LIMITS.
Introducing Nikon 1 V2, with the exceptional speed and performance of the Nikon 1 system, plus pro-style enhancements for greater creativity, flexibility, comfort and control. It has a grip for familiar shooting comfort, a built-in flash for manipulating the lighting of your images, new Best Moment Capture modes for catching exactly the right shots, PSAM exposure modes right on the dial and much more—all in a very compact size. For passionate shooters who want more control of their photos, Nikon 1 V2 delivers.

FREEZE THE PERFECT INSTANT
SLOW DOWN THE ACTION AND GET THE BEST OF WHAT'S SEEN
The best moments are made (and missed) in an instant. But imagine being able to slow down a moment while it's happening—to see live action in slow motion. With Nikon 1 V2's amazing new Slow View mode, that's exactly what happens. See the world in slow motion through the viewfinder, then easily grab the shot you want. Combine that with Smart Photo Selector, which fires 20 shots with a single shutter press and selects the best five for you, and you've got every advantage for catching life's best moments.

PUT YOUR CREATIVITY IN MOTION
TELL RICHER STORIES WITH MOTION SNAPSHOT AND ADVANCED MOVIE MODE
Nikon 1's popular Motion Snapshot blends motion, stills and sound to capture the essence of a moment like never before. With a single press of the shutter button, Nikon 1 V2 captures a short slow-motion movie sequence plus a single defining still image. Those elements are merged into a unique 10-second expression that can easily be shared in .mov or .nms formats. Even add background music to set the mood of that special moment. For video enthusiasts, Nikon 1 V2 features a new Advanced Movie Mode. Maintain PSAM exposure control while recording 1080p Full HD video with stereo sound. Smoothly track your subjects like a pro, even as the lighting changes.

CREATE AT THE SPEED OF LIFE
CAPTURE YOUR WORLD WITH UNRIVALED SPEED, PRECISION AND CLARITY
At the center of Nikon 1's success is its remarkable Advanced Hybrid Autofocus System offering both phase (73-point) and contrast-detection (135-point) autofocus. It zeroes in on subjects with such speed and precision, you'll never miss a shot. With Nikon 1 V2, you can harness that precision at a blazing fast 15 frames per second continuous shooting! When you divide one second of motion into 15 individual photos, you'll catch amazing views you've never seen. And every one of those photos will be exceptional, thanks to Nikon 1 V2's 14.2 megapixel CMOS sensor.

CONVENIENTLY SHARE WITH WI-FI CONNECTIVITY
Connect the optional WU-1b Wireless Adapter to the Nikon 1 V2 and wirelessly transfer photos to your smartphone, tablet or any compatible Wi-Fi enabled device. Use your smartphone to instantly upload your shots to the web or email them to a friend. Install Nikon's free Wireless Mobile Adapter Utility Android™- or iOS-powered app and remotely control the Nikon 1 V2—see what the camera sees from your smartphone or tablet and fire off shots!





SUPPLIED ACCESSORIES
 * EN-EL21 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery
 * MH-28 Battery Charger
 * UC-E19 USB Cable
 * BS-N3000 Multi Accessory Port Cover
 * BF-N1000 Body Cap
 * AN-N1000 Strap
 * ViewNX 2
 * Short Movie Creator CD
 * User's Manual
 * Reference manual CD
feature_bullets: PSAM modes right on the Mode Dial
Enhanced Motion Snapshot - Blend motion, stills and sound to capture the essence of a moment like never before
See the world in slow motion, then grab exactly the shot you want with the new Slow View
Get the best shot with Smart Photo Selector, which captures 20 shots with a single button press
Simultaneously shoot 1080p Full HD video and high-resolution stills of the same action
